full_summary:
## Tender Announcement - W0106-23J035

**Tender Title**
Music Instruments (W0106-23J035) for the Department of National Defence

### Background

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence is inviting proposals for the acquisition of a set of music instruments. The scope of work includes the delivery of the instruments to Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: [WS4211545307-Doc4211624511](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17636007?extsite=MTc2MzYwMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Publication Date**: October 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 31, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking a set of music instruments, specifically:

* Brass instruments
* Woodwind instruments
* Musical instrument sets

The tender will be evaluated on the basis of price. The successful bidder will be required to deliver the instruments to Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada.

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Martineau, Francois S (SPAC/PSPC) - [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

The tender documents are available on the [Ariba portal](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17636007?extsite=MTc2MzYwMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Bidders are responsible for ensuring that they have read and understood all the terms and conditions of the tender before submitting their proposal.
